```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyr)

library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)

```

```{r}

load_data <- function(state){
  s <- as.character(state)
  arg <- paste("clean-data/", s, ".Rdata", sep = "")
  load.Rdata(arg, s)
  
}

graph_word <- function(state, word){
  
  w <- as.character(word)
  s <- as.character(state)
  t <- paste("Cases Involving", w, "in", s)
  
  state %>% 
    select(name, decision_date, text, court_name) %>% 
    filter(grepl(word, text)) %>% 
    mutate(year = year(decision_date)) %>% 
    group_by(year) %>% 
    summarise(count = n()) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = year, y = count, color = state)) +
    geom_line() +
    labs(
      title = t
    ) +
    ylab(
      "Number of Cases"
    ) +
    xlab(
      "Year"
    )
    
}

```
```{r}
load_data("samoa")
graph_word(samoa, "defendant")
```
